title: FS/FT: Trimmed Fred Clark batting and Lundgren Chicago. (CLOSED)
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Trimmed Fred Clark batting and Lundgren Chicago. (CLOSED)
posts.post_content:
Ok, time to sell the HOFers. Take a look at the condition. I soaked off a cardboard backing on about 3/4 of these and that was it. It came right off. Didn't try to clean any of the fronts.

Please add $2 for shipping, no matter how many you buy. Any form of PayPal accepted.  I will listen to offers if you want more than 1, but anyone saying they will take it gets Priority.  There are a few I've been debating keeping so I have a higher price for them.....

I will also listen to trades and package deals.....especially for EPDGs and HOFers.


$SOLD Chesbro
$SOLD Clark
$SOLD Flick
$SOLD Keeler portrait
$SOLD Lundgren Chicago
$SOLD Marquand hands thighs
$SOLD McGraw finger
$SOLD Tinker hands knees
$SOLD Waddell throwing
$SOLD Wallace

SOLD: 
$SOLD Brown portrait no-name
$SOLD Brown portrait
$SOLD Evers
$SOLD Keeler batting
$SOLD Lajoie fielding
$SOLD Lajoie portrait
$SOLD Walsh
$SOLD Griffith
$SOLD Jennings
$SOLD Joss

I will take the two brown portraits and Evers.  On flight.  Will send PayPal when land.  Thanks Zach


Sent from my iPod touch using Tapatalk

I'll take Lajoie. PM sent.

EDIT: Just to clarify, portrait. Even though the other appears to be sold.
